messages.subject: Religion AND Politics re: #2158
messages.msgSnippet: To the person looking for a church in Digest 2158: Katherine got it right in her answer...why bother with people who want/expect you to explain yourself? Go
messages.messageBody:
To the person looking for a church in Digest 2158:

Katherine got it right in her answer...why bother with people who
want/expect you to explain yourself? Go where people accept you for what you
are.

All you need now is to join the Libertarian Party and you'll be set.
Libertarians want you to be able to live exactly the way you choose.

Still looking for a church that sees you as perfect just the way you are?
Check out Christian Science.

Ned Vare
